title: rsbriggs

content: I offer web automation using any of the following programming, my fees are cheap.BASSELENIUM OPEN BULLETwhy do you need web automationTo create more time for yourselfTo achieve a routine boring job with only few clicksand so on ....................What can be automated :Any cryptocurrency websites.Automate testing of a WEB applicationDo LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, Discord or other platform AutomationSolve Captcha without human interactionSearch keywords in bulk and save their result.Get contact info of companies from LinkedIn .Automate the process of buying products Fill forms, Upload images or any other file automaticallyPerform login on any social media or simple websiteScrap data with automation and save the result in Google sheets or CSVSend messages, Like, Share, Comment on Posts.Follow people on any platformScrap dynamic content.Scrap Emails from any websites.You can discuss with me for unlisted automated tasks, nothing is impossible.Send me pm here orÂ  Telegram - @cryptosgenius
